posts.name: Pietro N
posts.cooked:
When I try to instal vLLM via a docker - any ideas?:

:/workspace# pip uninstall -y packaging

Found existing installation: packaging 23.2

Uninstalling packaging-23.2:

Successfully uninstalled packaging-23.2

WARNING: Running pip as the ‘root’ user can result in broken permissions and conflicting behaviour with the system package manager, possibly rendering your system unusable. It is recommended to use a virtual environment instead: 12. Virtual Environments and Packages — Python 3.14.0 documentation . Use the --root-user-action option if you know what you are doing and want to suppress this warning.

root@aaa:/workspace# pip install packaging>=24.2

DEPRECATION: Loading egg at /usr/local/lib/python3.12/dist-packages/dill-0.3.9-py3.12.egg is deprecated. pip 25.1 will enforce this behaviour change. A possible replacement is to use pip for package installation. posts.name: Raphael Amorim
posts.cooked:
Try to use it with this docker file: Running nvidia/Nemotron-Nano-VL-12B-V2-NVFP4-QAD on your spark.
I’m using latest vLLM main version, but you can use any other tag.

posts.name: Pietro N
posts.cooked: thanks but I dont think this addresses my issue, I can’t install vLLM.
Take a look at this playbook and let us know if this helps answer your questions. Install and Use vLLM for Inference | DGX Spark
